languages.text: "Проще всего склонить подданных пред ослепительным сиянием вашего титула, шерин. Второй вариант требует чуть больше... терпения. Я уже нашла первую жерт... кхм, сердобольного малого, что стоит в очереди на пятьдесят мест перед нами. Подберите правильные слова к замку его души, и он сам будет рад обменяться талонами. А еще... В ваших силах решить проблемы некоторых просителей в обход заветного окошка. Разве может обычный люд желать чего-то, что не в силах дать покоритель{mf||ница} звезд?"

traits.locale_text: "Проще всего склонить подданных пред ослепительным сиянием вашего титкла, шерин. Второй вариант требует чуть больше... терпения. Я уже нашла первую жерт... кхм, сердобольного малого, что стоит в очереди на пятьдесят мест перед нами. Подберите правильные слова к замку его души, и он сам будет рад обменяться талонами. А еще... В ваших силах решить проблемы некоторых просителей в обход заветного окошка. Разве может обычный люд желать чего-то, что не в силах дать покоритель{mf||ница} звезд?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "The simplest way is to make these lowly subjects bow down before the blinding radiance of our title, shereen. The second option requires a little more... patience. I have already found our first vict— ah, the compassionate citizen who is standing fifty places ahead of us in the queue. Simply offer the right words to unlock his heart and he will gladly swap tickets with you. And also... you have the power to solve the problems of some petitioners, removing their need to visit a coveted window. After all, is there anything an ordinary citizen could want that is beyond the power of the conqueror of the stars to grant?"
languages.original_text: "Проще всего склонить подданных пред ослепительным сиянием вашего титула, шерин. Второй вариант требует чуть больше... терпения. languages.text: “最简单的方法，就是让这些卑贱的臣民在我们尊贵的身份面前俯首称臣，亲爱的。至于第二个方法，则需要更多的……耐心。我已经找到了我们的第一位受害——呃，第一位富有同情心的公民，他比我们靠前50个人。只要说出正确的话语，解开他的心结，他就会很乐意和你换票。而且……你有能力解决一部分请愿者的问题，这样他们就不需要再去窗口进行请愿了。毕竟，你是群星的征服者，而他们只是普通民众，他们怎么可能会有你实现不了的愿望呢？”
languages.original_text: "The simplest way is to make these lowly subjects bow down before the blinding radiance of our title, shereen. The second option requires a little more... patience. I have already found our first vict— ah, the compassionate citizen who is standing fifty places ahead of us in the queue. Simply offer the right words to unlock his heart and he will gladly swap tickets with you. And also... you have the power to solve the problems of some petitioners, removing their need to visit a coveted window. After all, is there anything an ordinary citizen could want that is beyond the power of the conqueror of the stars to grant?"

traits.locale_text: “最简单的方法，就是让这些卑贱的臣民在我们尊贵的身份面前俯首称臣，亲爱的。至于第二个方法，则需要更多的……耐心。我已经找到了我们的第一位受害——呃，第一位富有同情心的公民，他比我们靠前50个人。只要说出正确的话语，解开他的心结，他就会很乐意和你换票。而且……你有能力解决一部分请愿者的问题，这样他们就不需要再去窗口进行请愿了。毕竟，你是群星的征服者，而他们只是普通民众，他们怎么可能会有你实现不了的愿望呢？”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «La forma más sencilla es hacer que estos humildes súbditos se arrodillen ante el resplandor cegador de su título, shereen. La segunda opción requiere un poco más de... paciencia. Ya he localizado a nuestra primera vícti... eh, el buen ciudadano cincuenta puestos por delante de nosotros en la cola. Solo tiene que decirle las palabras correctas para devolver la claridad a su corazón e intercambiará su número agradecido. Y también... tiene la capacidad de resolver los problemas de algunos solicitantes, lo que eliminaría su necesidad de pasar por la ventanilla. Después de todo, ¿acaso hay algo que un ciudadano corriente pueda querer y {mf|el|la} conquistador{mf||a} de las estrellas no pueda conceder?».
languages.original_text: "The simplest way is to make these lowly subjects bow down before the blinding radiance of our title, shereen. The second option requires a little more... patience. I have already found our first vict— ah, the compassionate citizen who is standing fifty places ahead of us in the queue. Simply offer the right words to unlock his heart and he will gladly swap tickets with you. And also... you have the power to solve the problems of some petitioners, removing their need to visit a coveted window. After all, is there anything an ordinary citizen could want that is beyond the power of the conqueror of the stars to grant?"

traits.locale_text: «La forma más sencilla es hacer que estos humildes súbditos se arrodillen ante el resplandor cegador de su título, shereen. La segunda opción requiere un poco más de... paciencia. Solo tiene que decirle las palabras correctas para devolver la claridad a su corazón e intercambiará su número agradecido. Y también... tiene la capacidad de resolver los problemas de algunos solicitantes, lo que eliminaría su necesidad de pasar por la ventanilla. Después de todo, ¿acaso hay algo que un ciudadano corriente pueda querer y {mf|el|la} conquistador{mf||a} de las estrellas no pueda conceder?».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「シャリーン、一番手っ取り早い方法は、あたしらの目もくらむような肩書きで身分の低い臣下を従えてしまうことよ。第2の選択肢はちょっと…我慢が必要ね。もう最初のいけに―ううん、哀れな市民をこの列の50番先に見つけているの。そいつの心を開かせるための言葉をうまくかけてあげたら、喜んで番号札と交換してくれるはずよ。他の方法だと…陛下には嘆願者の問題を解決できるだけの権力があるわ。嘆願者が窓口に行かなくて済むように計らってあげればいいの。だって、ほら、一般市民が望むようなことが、この星の征服者の権力を越えるなんてことはないでしょう？」
languages.original_text: "The simplest way is to make these lowly subjects bow down before the blinding radiance of our title, shereen. The second option requires a little more... patience. I have already found our first vict— ah, the compassionate citizen who is standing fifty places ahead of us in the queue. Simply offer the right words to unlock his heart and he will gladly swap tickets with you. And also... you have the power to solve the problems of some petitioners, removing their need to visit a coveted window. After all, is there anything an ordinary citizen could want that is beyond the power of the conqueror of the stars to grant?"

traits.locale_text: 「シャリーン、一番手っ取り早い方法は、あたしらの目もくらむような肩書きで身分の低い臣下を従えてしまうことよ。第2の選択肢はちょっと…我慢が必要ね。もう最初のいけに―ううん、哀れな市民をこの列の50番先に見つけているの。そいつの心を開かせるための言葉をうまくかけてあげたら、喜んで番号札と交換してくれるはずよ。他の方法だと…陛下には嘆願者の問題を解決できるだけの権力があるわ。嘆願者が窓口に行かなくて済むように計らってあげればいいの。だって、ほら、一般市民が望むようなことが、この星の征服者の権力を越えるなんてことはないでしょう？」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Le moyen le plus simple serait d'obliger ces humbles sujets à s'incliner devant la radiance aveuglante de notre titre, shereen. La deuxième option, elle, nécessite un peu plus de... patience. J'ai déjà repéré notre première vict... je veux dire, le citoyen compatissant qui se trouve à une cinquantaine de places devant nous dans la file d'attente. Servez-lui un discours propre à l'attendrir et il acceptera volontiers d'échanger son numéro contre le vôtre. Troisième et dernière solution... vous avez le pouvoir de régler vous-même les problèmes de certains requérants, libérant ainsi de la place pour nous permettre d'accéder plus rapidement au guichet tant convoité. Après tout, que pourrait bien vouloir un citoyen ordinaire que l'auguste {mf|conquérant|conquérante} des étoiles ne soit pas en mesure de lui accorder ? »
languages.original_text: "The simplest way is to make these lowly subjects bow down before the blinding radiance of our title, shereen. The second option requires a little more... patience. I have already found our first vict— ah, the compassionate citizen who is standing fifty places ahead of us in the queue. And also... you have the power to solve the problems of some petitioners, removing their need to visit a coveted window. After all, is there anything an ordinary citizen could want that is beyond the power of the conqueror of the stars to grant?"

J'ai déjà repéré notre première vict... je veux dire, le citoyen compatissant qui se trouve à une cinquantaine de places devant nous dans la file d'attente. Après tout, que pourrait bien vouloir un citoyen ordinaire que l'auguste {mf|conquérant|conquérante} des étoiles ne soit pas en mesure de lui accorder ? »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Der einfachste Weg wäre, diese niederen Untertanen vor der blendenden Strahlkraft Eures Titels auf die Knie gehen zu lassen, Shereen. Die zweite Option erfordert ein wenig mehr ... Geduld. Ich habe bereits unser erstes Opf... äh, einen mitfühlenden Bürger gefunden, der etwa fünfzig Plätze vor uns in der Schlange steht. Wenn Ihr mit den richtigen Worten sein Herz öffnet, wird er freudig seine Nummer mit Euch tauschen. Darüber hinaus ... habt Ihr die Macht, einige Probleme der Antragsteller selbst zu lösen, sodass sie das Fenster nicht mehr aufsuchen müssen. Kann denn ein gewöhnlicher Bürger überhaupt etwas wollen, das ihm die Macht {mf|des Eroberers|der Eroberin} der Sterne nicht gewähren kann?"
languages.original_text: "The simplest way is to make these lowly subjects bow down before the blinding radiance of our title, shereen. The second option requires a little more... patience. I have already found our first vict— ah, the compassionate citizen who is standing fifty places ahead of us in the queue. And also... you have the power to solve the problems of some petitioners, removing their need to visit a coveted window. After all, is there anything an ordinary citizen could want that is beyond the power of the conqueror of the stars to grant?"

languages.text: "Bu işin en kolay yolu, naçizane tebaana göz kamaştıran ünvanlarımızla boyun eğdirmek olur şirinim. İkinci seçenekse biraz daha... Sabır gerektiriyor. Bize şimdiden kuyrukta elli sıra önümüzde olan bir kurb... Şey, merhametli bir yurttaş buldum bile. Adamın kalbinin kilidini açmak için doğru kelimeleri söylersen seve seve seninle fiş değiştirecektir. Ayrıca... Müracaatçılardan bazılarının sorunlarını çözüp bankolara gitme ihtiyaçlarına son verebilirsin. Sonuçta yıldızların fatihi olarak sıradan bir yurttaşın hangi isteği seni aşabilir ki?"
languages.original_text: "The simplest way is to make these lowly subjects bow down before the blinding radiance of our title, shereen. The second option requires a little more... patience. I have already found our first vict— ah, the compassionate citizen who is standing fifty places ahead of us in the queue. Simply offer the right words to unlock his heart and he will gladly swap tickets with you. And also... you have the power to solve the problems of some petitioners, removing their need to visit a coveted window. After all, is there anything an ordinary citizen could want that is beyond the power of the conqueror of the stars to grant?"
